statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_data WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_date FROM customer_data WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_data WHERE purchase_amount > 1000.00;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_data WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_data GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchases ASC, name;

SELECT customer_id, name, email, total_purchases, count(*) AS purchase_count FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;

SELECT customers.name, purchase_history.product_name, purchase_history.price, purchase_history.quantity FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE customers.total_purchases > 500 AND purchase_history.price < 50 ORDER BY customers.name ASC, purchase_history.price DESC;

SELECT customers.name, AVG(purchase_history.price) AS average_price, MAX(purchase_history.quantity) AS max_quantity FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING COUNT(purchase_history.purchase_id) > 3 ORDER BY average_price DESC, max_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_total) AS total_spent FROM customers GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE purchase_total > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT customers.name, SUM(transactions.amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING total_spent > 5000
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT id, name, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM purchase_details ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_spent FROM purchase_details GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchase_details WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY segment_name;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY preference_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_spent FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, total_spent FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY total_spent ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC, total_spent ASC
SELECT customer_name, address, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 AND age < 50
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent >= 5000 AND total_spent <= 10000
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
